item.title: 0756 Another Hugo Site From Scratch
item.description: Looking for tutorials on building hugo sites from scratch, and in particular anything that helps to understand the vagaries of leaf bundle, branch bundle and page bundle. This youtube video is actually about setting up a theme but the idea is to have a working hugo site with some leaf and branch bundles as a working system to examine. The github here contains a starting point from which a site HUGO-BUNDLE-1 without a theme has been constructed.
